name: Cafe Guardians
description:
In this frantic Aim-Trainer style game, you must manage to bake a cake on your spaceship and protect it from asteroids at the same time.

Switch between your cafe and outer space to cook bake and protect simultaneously. The more you progress on the cake, the harder the defense becomes.

CONTROLS :

Press space to switch between scenes

Click in cafe scene when the pointer lines up with the target to progress the baking process

Click on asteroids in space to defend the spaceship

To Successfully bake a caku, you will have to manage both at the same time
